data.title: How many spokes are there in the Dharma Chakra (Ashok Chakra) depicted on the National Flag of India?
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:how many spokes are there in the dharma chakra ashok chakra depicted on the national
data.text:
The circumference of the Chakra of National flag exceeds its diameter by 16.8cm. Find the radius of the chakra.

The Chakra we see on the Indian flag is also known as the _____ Chakra.
